Description: We're back and we're about to make it everyone's problem
Pleroma: An efficient and flexible fediverse server

About

This Mastodon server is dedicated to MastoAdmins from other instances.
Accounts here serve as a backup method to reach out to your Instance should it go down.

Special thanks to @macbiff for the idea!

Instructions

  1. Create an account with the Username similar to your Instance, eg. https://mastodon.sg will be @mastodonsg
  2. Provide your Instance URL as the reason to join, wait for approval.
  3. Setup your Profile, ie. Display Name, BIO, Avatar and Header
  4. Ensure that the first Label links back to your Instance Contact Username that is shown in the /about page.
  5. Also ensure that the URL is verified, any accounts which is not verified with the link back will be suspended.

    6. Server Info

    This server is hosted in Singapore.
    • 4 vCPU
    • 4GB Memory
    • BackBlaze B2 Media Storage
    • Cloudflare CDN, DDOS & WAF Protection
    • SMTP2GO Email Delivery
    • Hourly Backups locally and remotely

    Moderation

    Moderators reserve the right to suspend/restrict Users who go against the rules of this server.
    Please report any wrongdoings and weâ€™ll do our best to investigate.

    Mastodon Covenant

    Our server meets the Mastodon Server Covenant.

    Community Support & Sponsor(s)

    We do not serve Ads or sell your data, we rely solely on your support and our Sponsor(s). You can support us by donating to Ko-Fi.

    We would like to thank our sponsor(s) for keeping the lights running.

    • Sohwatt LLP
Short: Members are MastoAdmins of other instances.

Description:
Experience the Bay Area like never before with our Pixelfed instance. It's more than just a photo-sharing platform; it's a visual journey through every street, skyline, and sunset of our beloved Bay. Capture the moments that define your Bay Area - from its iconic landmarks to its hidden alleys - and share them with a community that cherishes every snapshot. Join us in weaving a vibrant tapestry of images that brings the Bay's story to life, one photo at a time.

Our full terms of use, policies, and code of conduct are available on the Community Hub. There you can read about corporate and organization accounts, updates from the team, and find instructions for filing DMCA Requests
Short: Discover and share the Bay Area's essence through your lens on our Pixelfed platform, where every photo tells a story of our vibrant community.

This is a server made for English-speaking residents of Japan. We aim to make an inclusive community for users of all colors, origins, genders and orientations to share their thoughts and experiences.

Description:
Welcome to Silicorn.social

Props to whoever made the joke first. Silicorn Valley is way better than "Silicon Heartland."

About

A Fediverse home for the Ohio Tech Community. If you're wondering if you belong in a tech community, you definitely do here! Not limited to Ohio residents or anything, but that's our core demographic.

Help Wanted

This instance was launched in September 2023 by one gal sitting on her couch. If you're interested in any of the following, reach out to @jess@silicorn.social

  • Helping to moderate the Silicorn.social community
  • Administration of a Mastodon server
  • Helping to craft rules / privacy policies / etc.

A quick note about NSFW content

We don't disallow it, but keep it under a Content Warning and don't make it the sole thing your account posts.

Logo

Our logo was graciously provided by @tarajdactyl@tech.lgbt under a CC BY-SA license.
Short: An instance for the Ohio Tech Community! Coders, ops, infosec, support, or anyone just kinda interested in tech is welcome here. A connection to Ohio (tech or otherwise) is ideal, not required.

Description:
Mise Ã  jour le 18 aoÃ»t 2023.

ShoniTown sert des gens qui vivent et/ou travaillent dans le village Shaughnessy et ses environs, un quartier multiculturel et dense situÃ© au centre-ville ouest de MontrÃ©al. Le village se trouve Ã  l'est de la rue Atwater et Ã  l'ouest de Guy, entre l'autoroute et la montagne.

La plupart d'entre nous dans le quartier utilisent des applis comme Instagram, WhatsApp, Facebook (tous propriÃ©tÃ©s de la sociÃ©tÃ© Ã©tats-unien Meta), WeChat (propriÃ©tÃ© de la sociÃ©tÃ© chinoise Tencent) et Telegram (propriÃ©tÃ© de deux frÃ¨res billionaires cachottiers d'origine russe) pour parler Ã  nos amiÂ·eÂ·s et Ã  notre famille, s'informer sur ce qui se passe dans le monde et dans notre ville, et simplement se dÃ©tendre en regardant des photos de chats. Mais ces services corporatifs, et d'autres, nous espionnent ; ils vendent les informations qu'ils obtiennent sur nous Ã  des annonceurs, Ã  des gouvernements et Ã  quiconque peut payer. Ces applis sont conÃ§ues pour nous rendre dÃ©pendants d'elles, que ce soit pour les infos ou pour nos salaires---ce qui signifie Ã©galement qu'il est dÃ©stabilisant de les voir s'effondrer ou choisir de se retirer du marchÃ© canadien en rÃ©ponse Ã  la lÃ©gislation issu d'Ottawa ou QuÃ©bec.

ShoniTown Ã©xecute avec Hometown, une version modifiÃ©e de Mastodon, que certainÂ·eÂ·s connaissent peut-Ãªtre dÃ©jÃ . L'opÃ©rateur du serveur habite dans le quartier (et si tu apprÃ©cie ce plateforme, tu peux lui aider payer les factures). Il n'y a pas d'algorithme pour te faire regarder ton Ã©cran le plus longtemps possible, et tes donnÃ©es ne seront vendues Ã  personne.

Bien que ShoniTown ne soit qu'un petit serveur, il est connectÃ© Ã  un rÃ©seau beaucoup plus vaste d'autres serveurs nommÃ© Â« le fÃ©divers Â». La plupart de ces serveurs sont Ã©galement gÃ©rÃ©s par des gens qui souhaitent que des nouvelles (et des photos de chats) puissent circuler librement, et de maniÃ¨re fiable, parmi les membres de leurs communautÃ©s.

English. Updated August 7, 2023.

ShoniTown is for people who live and/or work in and around Shaughnessy Village (east of Atwater and west of Guy, north of the highway and south of the mountain), a diverse and dense neighbourhood at the western end of downtown MontrÃ©al.

Most of us in the neighbourhood use applications like Instagram, WhatsApp, Facebook (all owned by the U.S.-based corporation Meta), WeChat (owned by China-based Tencent), and Telegram (owned by two secretive billionaires of Russian origin) to talk to our friends and family, learn about what's happening in the world and in our neighbourhoods, and just relax and look at pictures of cats. But these corporate services, and others, spy on us; they sell the information they learn about us to advertisers, to governments, and to anyone else who can pay. These applications are designed to addict us and to make us dependent on them, whether for news or for business---which also means it's destabilizing when they fall apart or when they choose to pull out of the Canadian market in response to laws passed by Ottawa or QuÃ©bec City.

ShoniTown runs on Hometown, a modified version of Mastodon, which some people may know about already. The server is owned and controlled by someone who lives in your neighbourhood (and if you like this service, you can help him pay the bills). There is no algorithm to keep you staring at your phone for as long as possible, and your information will not be sold to anyone.

Although ShoniTown is just one small server, it is connected to a much larger network of other servers called "the fediverse"; most of these servers are also run by people who want information (and cat photos) to be able to circulate freely, and reliably, among the members of their communities.

Legal stuff: The rules, written in French only, are definitive. Don't do anything fucked up.

Description:
Encuentra tu hogar en Social Cibernautas, una instancia de Mastodon creada y moderada por un grupo de amigos unidos por su pasiÃ³n por los videojuegos, los memes y el arte. AquÃ­ nos reunimos para compartir intereses, organizar eventos y disfrutar juntos. Un refugio seguro y respetuoso para todos, donde celebramos y valoramos la diversidad en todas sus formas.

Ayudas y donaciones

Social Cibernautas se ofrece sin Ã¡nimo de lucro. Eso no quita que mantener un servidor conlleve unos costes de mantenimiento, como la electricidad consumida o el pago de los dominios.

Si estÃ¡s encantado con tu experiencia en la instancia y con los servicios que ofrece el equipo de soporte, puedes mostrar tu satisfacciÃ³n por medio de una donaciÃ³n por Ko-fi y asÃ­ ayudar a mantener y mejorar el servidor.

Ten en cuenta, todas las donaciones van destinadas exclusivamente a cubrir gastos de mantenimiento y mejora del servidor.

Contenido para Adultos (NSFW)

Los avatares de perfil y las imÃ¡genes de encabezado no pueden ser sexualmente explÃ­citos, mostrar violencia ni contener imÃ¡genes de ese tipo.

El material sexualmente explÃ­cito debe tener una advertencia de contenido aplicada para marcarlo como sensible, de modo que la lÃ­nea de tiempo local sea segura para el trabajo.

Accesibilidad

La Ãºnica forma de ser una comunidad acogedora es siendo considerados con las personas que requieren herramientas como lectores de pantalla. Por esa razÃ³n:

  • Todos los toots de medios deben incluir texto alternativo (alt text).
  • Todas las hashtags de varias palabras deben de ir en formato #CamelCase.

RetenciÃ³n de Cuentas

En caso de que Social Cibernautas anuncie que planea dejar de operar el servidor, se cerrarÃ¡n las inscripciones de nuevas cuentas y a los titulares de cuentas actuales se les darÃ¡n seis meses de aviso anticipado para que puedan recibir ayuda para migrar sus cuentas a otro proveedor.

Equipo de ModeraciÃ³n

@lucasam - Administrador

Soporte

Puedes comunicarte con nosotros mencionando a @control o enviando un correo electrÃ³nico a soporte@cibernautas.club.

Estado del Servicio

En caso de problemas con el servidor, se proporcionarÃ¡n actualizaciones aquÃ­: cibernautas.instatus.com.
Short: Tu cosmos conectado en espaÃ±ol, donde brilla la creatividad y crecen las conexiones. Un espacio seguro y respetuoso para todos, donde se celebra la diversidad.

Description:
Welcome to Tulpa.Social!

This is a tulpa-friendly social network using mastodon.

Whether you are a tulpa, host, or other system, you're welcomed on this server.

If you like this site, please consider donating so we can keep the lights on ğŸ’¡

(It costs $348/year to run)

What is a Tulpa?

A tulpa is an entity created in the mind, acting independently of, and parallel to your own consciousness. They are able to think, and have their own free will, emotions, and memories. In short, a tulpa is like a sentient person living in your head, separate from you. Itâ€™s currently unproven whether or not tulpas are truly sentient, but in this community, we treat them as such. It takes time for a tulpa to develop a convincing and complex personality; as they grow older, your attention and their life experiences will shape them into a person with their own hopes, dreams and beliefs.

From Tulpa.info
Short: Tulpa-friendly mastodon server

Description:
WAF.social

Ãœber Uns

Dies ist eine Mastodoninstanz fÃ¼r alle Menschen, die sich verbunden mit dem Kreis Warendorf fÃ¼hlen. Ob ansÃ¤ssig oder Sympathisant - jeder ist herzlich willkommen!

Verhaltensreglen

Auf nrw.social ist unsere Hauptrichtlinie: - "Seid nett zueinander und behandelt andere so wie ihr behandelt werden wollt"

Da das nicht immer funktioniert, haben wir einige Punkte zusammengestellt, die euch helfen unsere Moderationsrichtlinien zu verstehen. Wie schlussendlich entschieden und wie die Regeln endgÃ¼ltig ausgelegt werden ist Sache des WAF.social Teams! Sollte es zu VerstÃ¶ÃŸen kommen behalten wir uns vor Toots, in schlimmen FÃ¤llen auch Accounts, zu lÃ¶schen.

Wir tolerieren insbesondere nicht:

  • BelÃ¤stigungen, Stalking, Doxing oder Dogpiling
  • Hassrede, Rassismus, Sexismus, Beschimpfungen oder deren BefÃ¼rwortung
  • Diskriminierung von Geschlechtern und sexuellen Minderheiten
  • GewalttÃ¤tige nationalistische Propaganda, Nazi-Symbolismus oder FÃ¶rderung der Ideologie des Nationalsozialismus
  • Verbreiten von Falschinformationen
  • Aufrufe zu Gewalttaten
  • In Deutschland illegale Inhalte
  • Sexueller Inhalt oder Gewaltdarstellungen
  • Nicht markierter Sexueller Inhalt von fremden Instanzen
  • Nicht markierte, automatisierte oder Ã¼bermÃ¤ÃŸige Werbung und reine Werbe-Accounts
  • Bots, die ohne ihre expliziten Anfragen mit Nutzern interagieren

Wenn du nicht mit jemandem interagieren mÃ¶chtest oder einen seiner BeitrÃ¤ge nicht sehen mÃ¶chtest, stehen dir Tools wie die Mute- und Blockfunktionen zur VerfÃ¼gung. Bitte melde Verhalten, von dem du glaubst, dass es die Regeln verletzt. Das schlieÃŸt Verhalten von anderen Instanzen mit ein. Achte auch darauf was du postest. Toots auf Mastodon sind erst einmal Ã¶ffentlich und das Internet vergisst nie! Wenn du nicht mÃ¶chtest, dass jeder deine BeitrÃ¤ge lesen kann, verwende die PrivatsphÃ¤re-Einstellungen.

FÃ¶deration

WAF.social glaubt nicht an Zensur. Fediverse ist ein Netzwerkdienst und die Aussetzung der Fediverse mit einem anderen Server wird nur als letztes Mittel durchgefÃ¼hrt. Sollten aber einzelne Instanzen dauerhaft entgegen unserer Regeln handeln, kÃ¶nnen diese durch uns stummgeschaltet oder gesperrt werden. Haben wir deiner Meinung nach eine falsche Entscheidung getroffen? Dann kontaktiere uns!

Backups und VerfÃ¼gbarkeit

Es werden tÃ¤gliche Backups der Instanz angelegt. WAF.social wird privat in unserer Freizeit betrieben. Wir behalten uns vor, den Dienst jederzeit aus rechtlichen, technischen oder finanziellen GrÃ¼nden einzuschrÃ¤nken oder zu beenden. Sollte dies der Fall sein, geben wir uns MÃ¼he, dies mindestens 3 Monate im Voraus bekannt zu geben.

Basierend auf

  • dem "About" von nrw.social
Short: Dies ist eine Mastodoninstanz fÃ¼r alle Menschen, die sich verbunden mit dem Kreis Warendorf im schÃ¶nen MÃ¼nsterland fÃ¼hlen. Ob ansÃ¤ssig oder Sympathisant - jeder ist herzlich willkommen!

Description: the church of meow

Welcome to cyber.ms - the Mastodon instance for all Cyberpunks and Edgerunners out there!

cyber.ms is a partner instance of CORTEX IMPLANT, NIGHT CITY BAR, and TOTENTANZ, and is part of the OBEY THE SYSTEM network.

At cyber.ms, you'll find a home for all things related to the digital underground life, cyberculture, technology, privacy, hacking, and everything that makes the heart of a cyber-oriented individual beat faster.

Join our community, connect with like-minded individuals, and share your thoughts, projects, and discoveries in a safe and private environment. cyber.ms is the place where you can exchange freely and generate new ideas without compromising.

Check out the cool features of our instance, cyber.ms:

  • ğŸ” Elasticsearch for enhanced search functionality
  • ğŸ’¬ Translation via self-hosted LibreTranslate for seamless communication
  • ğŸ˜ Mastodon with glitch-soc for a unique user experience
  • ğŸ’œ Self-hosted platform for increased control and privacy
  • ğŸ’¾ Daily backups to ensure data security
  • ğŸ’ Cybertoot-Button for quick and easy sharing
  • ğŸ“Ÿ Cyberware compatible to enhance your digital experience
  • â›” Meta/Instagram blocked for a more focused and advertisement-free environment

Join cyber.ms and experience a truly cutting-edge Mastodon instance tailored for Cyberpunks and Edgerunners like you!

At cyber.ms, we embrace the spirit of cyberpunk and welcome all who identify with this vibrant and diverse culture. Our server thrives on the principles of innovation, privacy, and freedom â€“ values that define the cyberpunk ethos.

However, in keeping with our commitment to create a secure and trusted environment for all members, access to cyber.ms is invitation-based. This approach ensures that our community remains cohesive, respectful, and in line with our shared cyberpunk values.

To join us, one needs to receive an invitation from an existing member. This process allows us to maintain a close-knit community where every member has been vouched for, fostering a secure space where ideas and conversations can flow freely without compromise.

We believe this method enhances the quality of interactions and strengthens the bonds within our community, making cyber.ms a unique and vibrant space for all cyberpunk enthusiasts.

If you see yourself as part of this digital frontier and are keen to join our ranks, we encourage you to connect with current members and express your interest. We look forward to potentially welcoming you into our midst and together pushing the boundaries of the cyberpunk realm.

The following is an essential, though not exhaustive, guide that outlines the behaviors contributing to an inclusive and safe environment for everyone. Failure to comply may lead to content removal, silencing, or suspension of accounts, strictly at the discretion of our instance administrators as outlined in our terms.

If someone's behavior is troubling you, please let us know. Your report will be treated with confidentiality.

  • Discriminatory behavior and content advocating oppression or hatred against marginalized groups are unacceptable. This includes targeting based on ethnicity, gender identity or expression, sexual identity or expression, physical characteristics or age, disability or illness, nationality, socio-economic status, or religious beliefs (to name some, but not limited to these).
  • Threatening behavior, stalking, and doxxing will not be tolerated.
  • Harassment in any form, including brigading, dogpiling, or unsolicited contact with a user who has requested disengagement, is prohibited.
  • Mobbing, including name-calling, intentional misgendering or deadnaming of individuals, is forbidden.
  • Violent nationalist propaganda, Nazi symbolism, or the promotion of National Socialism ideology is strictly banned.
  • Conspiracy narratives or reactionary myths condoning or leading to any of the aforementioned behaviors are not welcome.
  • Actions aimed at damaging this instance or its performance may result in immediate suspension.
  • Content deemed illegal in Germany will be expunged and could result in immediate account suspension.
  • We are committed to maintaining a spam-free environment. Spam, fraud, or theft, including undue cross-posts, unwanted commercial content, and crypto/NFT projects unaligned with our community ethos, is unwelcome. AI Art is permitted under specific conditions: it must be marked "unlisted," clearly labeled as AI Art, and non-commercial.

Any user found in violation of these rules may face a range of consequences, from a formal warning to account suspension or limited access. Our priority is to ensure a safe, spam-free environment for all members, and we are dedicated to upholding these standards diligently.

Here at cyber.ms, our digital commune thrives on respect, inclusivity, and mutual support. It is our collective responsibility to ensure that racism, discrimination, doxing, hate speech, and raids find no harbor in our space. Consequently, we have put measures in place, including blocking or muting certain instances, to preserve the integrity of our environment.

For legal and ethical reasons, we do not publish a list of blocked or limited instances. The decision to block or mute is carefully considered, largely because the block list may contain links to content that contravenes German and European law.

If you find yourself unable to connect with a friend and discover they are muted or blocked, and you believe this might be an oversight or unjust, we encourage open dialogue. Please reach out to @lyra with your concerns.

Description:
About Us

We're a (chosen) family of queer people: artists, nerds, philosophers, and lovers.

I'm new to this Mastodon thing. Help me!

Go check out fedi.tips and follow @feditips@mstdn.social - it's a great resource for finding your bearings.

If you're still confused, ask @amras! They'll be happy to show you around!

Timelines & Visibility

Here's how Mastodon timelines work:
TimelineWhat you see
HomeAny post from any user or hashtag you follow
LocalPublic posts from people on this server
FederatedPublic posts from outside this server - if someone on this server follows or boosts them.

Here's a flowchart that goes into more detail.

Local-only Posting

If you click the chain-link icon below your post, you'll be able to set it to "local-only". This means that your post will only be visible to other users on this server; it won't show up for anyone else.

If your mastodon client that doesn't have that option, you can add the :local_only: emoji to your post instead.

This is possible because we run the Hometown flavor of Mastodon.

Filters & Comfort

If you want to hide a post from your timeline, you can always select "Filter this post". If you'd like to hide all posts containing a specific phrase, you can go into Preferences>Filters to set up custom rules.

Searchability

Mastodon posts won't show up in search results, unless you use #hashtags.

Lists

A good strategy for using mastodon is to follow as many people as you can. Then, find special groups (like close friends, or writers, or photographers) and put them in custom Lists.

Donations

We don't have anything set up, but get in touch if you want to help cover hosting costs.

Emoji

This server uses selected emoji from these sources:

  • Blobhaj emoji, by heatherhorns, licensed under the Creative Commons Attribution 4.0 International License.
  • Meowmoji, licensed under the Apache License 2.0.
  • Pride Hearts by Maeve, licensed under the Basic License
  • The wrapped heart polyamorous pride flag, licensed under CC0
  • Pridemoji cats - shape licensed under Apache License 2.0; code licensed under the MIT License

and a small number of others, whose creator & licenses are difficult to track down.
Short: An invite-only server for a chosen family of queer people.

Impressum

Die SÃ¤chsische Datenschutz- und Transparenzbeauftragte (SDTB) betreibt diese Mastodon-Instanz zum Zwecke der eigenen Presse- und Ã–ffentlichkeitsarbeit. Andere Ã¶ffentliche Stellen aus Sachsen kÃ¶nnen ebenfalls einen offiziellen BehÃ¶rden-Account auf diesem Server erhalten. Sonstige Ã¶ffentliche Stellen sind aufgrund der begrenzten Ressourcen der SDTB von dem Angebot vorerst noch ausgenommen.

Bitte berÃ¼cksichtigen Sie auÃŸerdem, dass die SDTB keine HochverfÃ¼gbarkeit der Instanz garantiert und Nutzende selbst fÃ¼r ihre Inhalte verantwortlich sind.

Bei Interesse an der Einrichtung eines Zugangs oder Fragen/Meldungen zu Inhalten wenden Sie sich bitte an socialmedia@sdtb.sachsen.de.

Hinweis zur Finanzierung

Diese Mastodon-Instanz wird mitfinanziert durch Steuermittel auf der Grundlage des vom SÃ¤chsischen Landtag beschlossenen Haushaltes.

Netiquette â€“ Verhaltensregeln auf social.sachsen.de

SelbstverstÃ¤ndlich mÃ¼ssen auch auf der Mastodon-Instanz der SDTB die gesetzlichen Vorschriften und allgemeinen Nutzungsbedingungen eingehalten werden. Das Diskutieren und der Austausch mit anderen Nutzerinnen und Nutzern klappt am besten mit einem freundlichen und respektvollen Umgangston. Nicht erwÃ¼nscht sind deshalb BeitrÃ¤ge, die den nachfolgenden GrundsÃ¤tzen nicht genÃ¼gen:

  • Beleidigungen, Verleumdungen und Ã¼ble Nachrede
  • Provokationen sowie BeitrÃ¤ge mit vulgÃ¤ren, gewaltverherrlichenden, diskriminierenden, rassistischen, antisemitischen, sexistischen, hasserfÃ¼llten und/oder gesetzeswidrigen Ã„uÃŸerungen oder Inhalten

  • BeitrÃ¤ge mit schutzwÃ¼rdigen personenbezogenen Daten
  • BeitrÃ¤ge in anderer als deutscher oder englischer Sprache, da die SDTB sonst deren erforderliche inhaltliche Kontrolle nicht mÃ¶glich ist

Alle BeitrÃ¤ge, die die Netiquette verletzen, werden gegebenenfalls auch ohne Angabe von GrÃ¼nden verborgen oder gelÃ¶scht. Personen kÃ¶nnen auch dauerhaft aus der Diskussion ausgeschlossen bzw. blockiert werden.

Description:
The (unofficial) Atheopagan Network is a service for atheopagans, and other science-based pagan naturalists to share information, resource,and memes, with the larger community.

atheopagan.net is a gift and act of love to the community as a space to connect free of corporate surveillance. There are no marketing algorithms on Mastodon. Content is curated, distributed, moderated, and maintain by participants of the Fediverse, an organic network of independent interconnected opensource systems.

This instance is not officially affiliated, managed, or administrated by The Atheopagan Society. All views and opinions expressed are those of individuals and do not reflect the views and opinions of The Atheopagan Society.

What is Atheopaganism?

Atheopaganism is a naturalistic religion comprised of principles, practices and observances celebrating life and the passage of the seasons in fun, creative, and meaningful ways. Our path is free of belief in literal personal gods, the supernatural, or other scientifically unsupported concepts.

You can learn more here:
The Atheopagan Society
Mark Green's Blog

Mastodon & The Fediverse

Mastodon's interface is clean and elegant with functions similar to other popular social media platforms. Unlike other platforms, it does not harvest or sell your data to companies for feeding marketing algorithms that push content they want you to see. Instead your feed grows as you follow others, and expands based on the interests of those you follow. This makes it more private and secure than other social networks.

Those new to Mastodon often comment about the difference in overall culture as compared to the big name platforms. Even though there is problematic behavior as is found on any social media platform, Mastodon allows more flexibility for community moderation. There is a cross instance culture of moderation that acts quickly to questionable content such as pedophiles, fascism, racism, and down right bigoted nasty people.

Why the atheopagn.net instance?

People are becoming more suspicious and hesitant to interact on popular platforms because of increased global legal scrutiny of these platform's privacy practices. Atheopagan.net was created as a place for atheopagans & pagan naturalists to be in community without having to compromise their digital privacy.

This is not intended to replace the communities that have grown and thrived on other platforms, but to provide an alternative space away from those platforms. Thus, it intended to be a small group. However, a smaller group can foster more meaningful social media experience, which is why many people have made the switch to Mastodon and other federated services.

Who's on Mastodon?

You can find a variety of interesting people and content to follow on Mastodon. There are entertainers like George Take and Stephen Fry; Activists like Greta Thunberg; and many scientists, artists, journalists, academics, and all walks of life including pagans and witches. The list grows daily!

How it works and how to use it

Mastodon is a microblog where you make short posts of text limited to 500 characters, upload pictures, and share videos from places like YouTube, PeerTube, and Dailymotion. Like other social media, you can share posts (boosting), like content, (favorites), and save content to read later (bookmarks).

An instance, like this one, is an independent server, and there is no central company directing development. Instead many people across the globe work on the program. Anyone can take that code and create a variation (called a fork).

This means there are many instances you can choose to join. Some are focused on specific topics, and others are more general. You can share and follow content from any instance and view it from your account. This means individuals and communities have more control over the content that is circulated. Check out the following links to learn more.

Fedi.Tips An Unofficial Guide to Mastodon & The Fediverse
fediverse.info The bespoke fediverse guide
video@TILvids Mastodon in 180 Seconds

Advantages

  • The volume of content is less overwhelming then on other platforms.
  • You can fine tune the type and amount of content on your personal feed.
  • Content is presented in a linear timeline
  • You have more anonymity and control over you personal data
  • Communal moderation minimizes bad actors and spam
  • Free of advertisement
  • The platform does not fallow you around the internet.
  • Decentralized

Disadvantages

  • Userbase is not as large as other platforms
  • Sharing and following content across instances works a little differently
  • Requires you to find interesting content on your own
  • Slightly different lingo than other platforms
  • Decentralized

Browser Extensions

StreetPass Firefox | Chrome
discover who has a Mastodon account when surfing the web

Simplified Federation Firefox
simplifies following Mastodon accounts across The Fediverse

Share to Mastodon Firefox
easy way to share links and tabs on Mastodon

Mastodon Link Chrome
like Share to Mastodon but for Chrome

Graze Firefox | Chrome
link sharing for both Firefox and Chrome

Description:
Last updated Oct 10, 2023

Terms of Service

This document lays out the ground rules for participating in the opensocial.media community. It is intended to protect all members of our community from harassment and to ensure that our community is as welcoming and inclusive as possible. This is a working document, so opensocial.media may amend this ToS to better meet these goals in the future.

The following guidelines are not a legal document, and final interpretation is up to the administration of opensocial.media; they are here to provide you with an insight into our content moderation policies:

The following types of content will be removed from the public timeline:

  • Excessive advertising
  • Uncurated news bots posting from third-party news sources
  • Untagged nudity, pornography and sexually explicit content, including artistic depictions
  • Untagged gore and extremely graphic violence, including artistic depictions
  • Fake news, anti-vaccination spam

The following types of content will be removed from the public timeline, and may result in account suspension and revocation of access to the service:

  • Racism or advocation of racism
  • Sexism or advocation of sexism
  • Casteism or advocation of casteism
  • Discrimination against gender and sexual minorities, or advocation thereof
  • Xenophobic and/or violent nationalism

The following types of content are explicitly disallowed and will result in revocation of access to the service:

  • Sexual depictions of children
  • Content illegal in Germany and/or France, such as holocaust denial or Nazi symbolism
  • Conduct promoting the ideology of National Socialism or White Nationalism

Any conduct intended to stalk or harass other users, or to impede other users from utilizing the service, or to degrade the performance of the service, or to harass other users, or to incite other users to perform any of the aforementioned actions, is also disallowed, and subject to punishment up to and including revocation of access to the service. This includes, but is not limited to, the following behaviors:

  • Continuing to engage in conversation with a user that has specifically has requested for said engagement with that user to cease and desist may be considered harassment, regardless of platform-specific privacy tools employed.
  • Aggregating, posting, and/or disseminating a personâ€™s demographic, personal, or private data without express permission (informally called doxing or dropping dox) may be considered harassment.
  • Inciting users to engage another user in continued interaction or discussion after a user has requested for said engagement with that user to cease and desist (informally called brigading or dogpiling) may be considered harassment.

These provisions notwithstanding, the administration of the service reserves the right to revoke any userâ€™s access permissions, at any time, for any reason, except as limited by law.

Goals

  • Provide a friendly, safe, and welcoming environment for everyone, regardless of level of experience, gender identity or expression, sexual orientation, disability, personal appearance, body size, race, ethnicity, age, religion, nationality, political affiliation, or other similar characteristic.
  • Create a supportive community, where people freely share their passions and are excited and positive about each otherâ€™s successes.

Non-Goals

While itâ€™s important to know what opensocial.media is, itâ€™s just as important to understand what weâ€™re not. opensocial.media is not:

  • A free speech zone. mastaudon.org is a community with specific â€” and high â€” standards of behavior. If you would like to exercise your full free speech rights, you can do so somewhere else; while on mastaudon.org, you should agree to follow the community rules set out in this ToS.
  • An advocacy space. There are many important, controversial and political issues; and advocating for what you believe is important. However, opensocial.media is not the place for that advocacy. Even correct views can violate our ToS.

Reporting Violations

If you notice a toot that violates this code of conduct, please report it. It is easy to assume that someone else has already reported a toot, but it is easy for everyone to feel that way and no one to report the toot.

Catch-all

The moderation team will always take a pragmatic approach to every report they receive - if they feel that a problematic Toot isnâ€™t explicitly called out in this ToS, yet is inappropriate for opensocial.media, the Toot will likely be removed and the member will be dealt with appropriately

About Pubble

Pubble is an esteemed platform that streamlines and optimizes the publishing process, offering a unified system for editorial, sales, design, and administration, accessible anytime and anywhere. We facilitate the creation of a broad array of publications, including newspapers, magazines, websites, and apps, embracing both print and online mediums. Pubble takes pride in supporting publishers of all sizes, and now, weâ€™re taking a step further into the fediverse with Pubble.Social.

Pubble.Social is dedicated to creating a respectful and inclusive environment where publishers and their readers can interact, share, and explore the federated space of Mastodon.

Funding and Support

Pubble.Social is funded and supported by Pubble. We aim to keep access to the platform as barrier-free as possible for publishers of all sizes.
Short:
Welcome to Pubble.Social: Streamlining Publishing in the Fediverse!
Pubble simplifies, enhances, and streamlines publishing with a unified system for editorial, sales, design, and administration.

Description:
FreeSewing is an open source library for parametric design, with a specific focus on sewing patterns. It is maintained by Joost De Cock (that's me, FreeSewing's benevolent dictator) with contributions from various people, and financially supported by the FreeSewing patrons.

Community Standards

When you engage with the FreeSewing community, please remember the following simple rules:

Be nice

We will not accept comments that are either offensive in themselves or clearly offensive to others.

Please avoid obscenities and other insulting language, and show respect for fellow users, public figures and the fundamental principles we hopefully all share.

Without wanting to be exhaustive, that means no racism, xenophobia, calls to violence, discrimination based on religion, ethnic origin, gender, age, body shape, language, â€¦.

Donâ€™t spam

You are free to use freesewing.social for your personal account on the fediverse and talk about things that are not related to FreeSewing. However, we would appreciate it if you refrain from posting advertisements or spam.

(I appreciate that this is open to interpretation, so as a guiding principle steer clear of anything that reeks of an effort at bulk monetization)

Donâ€™t get us in trouble

Content that is defamatory, unlawful, or puts us in legal jeopardy is also against the rules.

Moderation

This Mastodon instance is managed by joost, and a small number of trusted friends help with moderation. This is the moderation team and we will enforce the rules as outlined in our code of conduct.

We rely on the community to report content or behaviour that goes against our values.

Thanks in advance for helping us make this a place where everyone can feel welcome.
Short: The home of FreeSewing on the fediverse. Open to the wider FreeSewing community.

Description:
Contact Us

  • Technical Support: help@social.example
  • Press/Media Enquiries: media@social.example
  • Legal/Regulatory/Compliance: legal@toot.wales

Welcome to Example.Social!

To ensure a safe environment for all, we've established some key rules and guidelines, especially around content moderation.

Content Moderation Policies

Our instance prohibits:

  • Illegal content as per EU laws and local regulations.
  • Infringement of intellectual property rights or personal privacy.

Moderation Tools and Measures:

  • Content Warnings (CW): Users must apply CWs to sensitive content to inform others before viewing.
  • Account Isolation: In cases of severe rule violations, we may isolate accounts. Isolation means that your ability to interact with others on the platform will be restricted.
  • Suspension: Accounts that repeatedly or severely violate our rules may be suspended from our service. We reserve the right to apply a temporary or permanent suspension

Changes to Terms and Conditions

We commit to notifying you of any significant changes to these rules. Updates may be communicated through platform announcements or in our Notice Updates.

Fair and Objective Enforcement

We aspire to make all content moderation decisions diligently and objectively. To this end, we have regard to the fundamental rights of our users (such as the right to free expression and media pluralism) and the principle of proportionality.

We rely on community moderation and human review.

Language Availability

These rules are published in [languages offered], ensuring accessibility for all users across the Member States we serve.

Contact and Feedback

For questions, clarifications, or to report violations, please reach out to us at [contact information]. We're dedicated to maintaining a positive and respectful space for everyone in our community.

About This Sandbox

A sandbox service for content moderation and trust & safety experiments. Members can interact with fictional accounts to practice moderation and management activities.

If you are a current moderator and would like an account on this server to play in the sandbox, please register and tell us your existing account with moderator privileges in the "Reason to join".

All incoming reports are assumed to be tests and are ignored.

If you need to reach someone regarding this service please contact @jaz@mastodon.iftas.org

Join the IFTAS chat: https://matrix.to/#/#space:matrix.iftas.org

Learn more about IFTAS: https://about.iftas.org
Short: A free sandbox service for content moderation and trust & safety experiments.

Description:
the what and the who?

"diaspora.im" is glitch-soc (a mastodon fork) fediverse server, envisioned as a space for the diaspora - the displaced - the sidelined - the marginalised.

the name of the server is a reference to the dictionary meaning of 'diaspora':

diaspora | dÊŒÉªËˆasp(É™)rÉ™ | noun the dispersion or spread of a folks from their original homeland

it is also a riff on the notion that non-white folks are necessarily displaced from the "common" or "dominant" culture. and while we prioritise the comfort and safety of black, disabled, queer folk, we welcome all of you here.

the why

the online digital community is a hostile place for us. the fediverse is a constant hotbed of bigotry at any given moment. my goal with this space is to provide an option for us. an option that is not white-centric, not cis- or hetero- centric, and not abled-centric. i am black, queer, and disabled myself so feel comforted in the fact that out of my own sense of self-preservation will come an approach to managing this server with sanity, safety, accessibility, and comfort at the forefront. we do not have enough options. diaspora.im is one more option.

how do i join?

click the "Create account" button and enter your sign-in details. you will be asked to confirm your account via email. please use a valid email address that you will continue to have access to. this is the primary way that you will retain access to your account.

once you have confirmed you email address, you will be asked to enter a reason for joining. all accounts require approval on this server and a reason is required. let us know a little about you and why you want to be here. be aware that there will be a waiting period while we process your join request and allow for some time for that process to complete.

note that we prioritise black, disabled, queer folk here. (see "the what and the who" above.)

moderation policies

we are a proactively moderated server. we take swift and decisive action with reports and pre-emptively issue blocks and suspensions liberally to ensure a minimal amount of the harassment we often get from the rest of the world.

here on diaspora.im, we are explicitly anti-imperialist, anti-fascist, and anti-capitalist and we subscribe to the following political philosophies:

  • Black liberation
  • gender expansiveness
  • disability justice
  • fat liberation
  • class warfare
  • prison abolition

any actions taken by users that align with white supremacy, antiblackness, colorism, ableism, transmisia, misogyny, fat hate, gender binarism, or cissexism/heterosexism will be addressed. warnings, post deletion, silencing, and suspension are all on the table when it comes to moderation.

we started out with thebad.space blocklist export at heat rating 50% because we wanted to make sure we filter out the problematic instances right off the bat. i ( @fyrfli ) personally vetted the list before importing it to confirm the domains on the list were domains we wanted blocked.

our blocklist will be maintained by hand in the immediate future by making instance block decisions on a case by case basis. that might change once thebad.space has matured fully.

whole instance blocks will be communicated to the community with at least 30 days notice.

sibling instances!

these are instances whose mod/admin teams we work very closely with, given our shared vision and goals for building a safer fediverse for marginalised groups and oppressed peoples. think of us as different houses in the same neighbourhood.

if you've used akkoma, you would recognise this as a kind of similar to bubble instances.

these instances are as follows:

  • artcrimes.gay - donate here
  • h-i.social - donate here
  • blackqueer.life - donate here

best practices for accessibility

some of our users are disabled (for example, 1 in 4 black american adults), and to make sure that everyone is provided with the tools they need to participate fully in our community, here are some collective habits that we should adopt:

  • alt-text your images. if you are not in a position to do so, please use #AltTextHelp and someone from the community should be able to help and provide it. another tag you can use,#ALT4me, lets you ask for an alt text for your image and #ALT4you or #ALT4U can be used in the comments to indicate to the op that you've written an alt text for them to add to their image
  • avoid using too many emojis in a row. example: putting 3 smiley faces in a row, or 60 red flags. screen readers do not handle them well
  • use PascalCase for hashtags e.g. #AltTextHelp
  • when sharing a link, provide a brief description of where the link directs to
  • use captions in uploaded videos

(these best practices were inspired by disabled.social via bql)

a note on privacy and security

the privacy policy is the stock one that comes with glitch, so here is a bit of additional info:

  • we only retain data that we absolutely need to log you in and let you post and interact
  • we will not retain anything if you delete your account outside of details that may linger as a result of filing a report. the internal moderation page will show your username but crossed out
  • we don't control other servers however so we can't control or even know if they're not doing iffy shit, whether they mean to or not - one of the downsides of federation is that once it leaves our server, it's pretty much out of our hands.
  • we do not allow scraping or archiving, however we have little power to stop such things. remember, this is the internet. nothing is private really.

(this section shamelessly adapted from the artcrimes.gay code of conduct - thanks evel)

server details

this server is running glitch-soc, a fork of mastodon, using the managed hosting provider, fedi monster. you can see more information by going to their page, but daily backups and regular updates are included.

if you would like to help sustain the server, you can donate via liberapay or ko-fi or contribute to the collective.

at the moment, i ( @fyrfli ) am the only person on the administration team but that will change in the near future as we grow.

final thoughts

i am an open book. you can ask me anything. i try to think of myself as approachable and i expend extra effort to address any and all concerns in a measured manner. please feel free to @ me, dm me, email me, or whatever if you have any concerns, feedback, questions, etc.

(adapted from bql - thanks eva)
Short: this space is envisioned as a space for the diaspora ... the displaced; the sidelined; the marginalised. an option for BiPOC folks on the fediverse to move out of wholly white-controlled instances.

Description:
Header image: Saabe Dream by Mishiikenh Kwe Used with permission Â©Mishiikenh Kwe https://www.instagram.com/mishiikenhkwe

This instance is for allies of BIPOC/marginalized people only. To register here you MUST enter a reason at the 'Reason to register' prompt. Failure to do this WILL result in your registration rejection. You MUST read and agree to this entire document.

Mvskoke Nation citizens own, administer and moderate TurtleIsland.* and Allies.* instances. Allies also moderate Allies.* instances

If you have any official questions, reach out to one of the admins:
@Yehuda@TurtleIsland.social or @Tzipporah@TurtleIsland.social.

Welcome to Allies.social!

TurtleIsland.* instances are for North American Native/Indigenous only
  • TurtleIsland.social is a (Twitter-like) Mastodon instance originally established Dec 2022.
  • TurtleIsland.rocks is a (Twitter-like) Akkoma instance originally established Dec 2023.
  • TurtleIsland.buzz is a (Instagram-like) Pixelfed instance originally established Mar 2024.
  • TurtleIsland.video is a (YouTube-like) PeerTube instance originally established Sep 2023.
Allies.* instances are for allies of BIPOC/marginalized people only
  • Allies.social is a (Twitter-like) Mastodon instance originally established Oct 2023.
  • Allies.rocks is a (Twitter-like) Akkoma instance originally established Dec 2023.
  • Allies.buzz is a (Instagram-like) Pixelfed instance originally established Mar 2024.
  • Allies.video is a (YouTube-like) PeerTube instance originally established Jan 2024.

Fediverse?

The Fediverse is a social media network that uses the ActivityPub protocol. TurtleIsland.* and Allies.* instances, as well as other applications/network nodes (instances) are connected and communicate with each other via the Fediverse (ActivityPub) network. You only need to join one instance to like, follow, post, view and share content with the thousands of other instances in the Fediverse.

Why?

TurtleIsland.* and Allies.* instances are ad-free, corporate-free, bigotry-free, and culture respectful environments for North American Native/Indigenous people and their allies to be in community and safe spaces.

  • Ultimately, we are helping to build an Indigenized social network.
  • We stand with our people.
  • We know and support their struggles.
  • We moderate to Indigenous standards not colonial standards.

Who? Where?

TurtleIsland.* instances accept user registrations from North American Native/Indigenous people only.

  • TurtleIsland.social user registrations are available through the 'Create Account' portal at https://TurtleIsland.social/about
  • TurtleIsland.rocks user registrations are available through the 'Register' portal at https://TurtleIsland.rocks/registration
  • TurtleIsland.buzz user registrations are available through the 'Sign up' portal at https://TurtleIsland.buzz
  • TurtleIsland.video user registrations are available through the 'Request an account' portal at https://TurtleIsland.video

Allies.* instances accept user registrations from allies of BIPOC/marginalized people only.

  • Allies.social user registrations are available through the 'Create account' portal at https://Allies.social/about
  • Allies.rocks user registrations are available through the 'Register' portal at https://Allies.rocks/registration
  • Allies.buzz user registrations are available through the 'Sign up' portal at https://Allies.buzz
  • Allies.video user registrations are available through the 'Request an account' portal at https://Allies.video

How much?

TurtleIsland.* and Allies.* instances are 100% free. We will never charge fees or pressure anyone for donations. All expenses are paid for by the administrators and donations.

If you'd like to help with Turtle Island expenses:

  • https://ko-fi.com/TurtleIsland
  • https://cash.app/$Yehuda1491
  • https://venmo.com/Yehuda1491

If you receive Pension/Social Security/Disability or less please don't. But if you can help Native/Indigenous Fediverse instances thrive and grow, it would be much appreciated.

What?

TurtleIsland.* and Allies.* instances are small/medium sized instances due to our specialized nature.

  • TurtleIsland.* and Allies.* instances will never be large general purpose instances and will be Indigenized as much as possible.
  • We are federated with 99% of the Fediverse but use no relays in order to maximize content relevant to our users.

TurtleIsland.* and Allies.* instances believe 100% in true Native/Indigenous Nation sovereignty, physical and digital LandBack. We reject calls to assimilate into the nearly all white culture Fediverse. The whole ghettoization theory is white supremacy garbage.

Blocked instances

We use the Oliphant Tier 0 blocklist, which blocks the majority of the bad actors without getting crazy aggressive. If you see anything blocked or not blocked that you believe is in error, let us know.

  • All TurtleIsland.* and Allies.* instances block Threads.

Commitment

TurtleIsland.social and Allies.social are committed to 3 months notice in the extremely unlikely event we should decide to pull the plug. All other instances are committed to 30 days notice.

Backup and Maintenence

  • TurtleIsland.social and Allies.social configuration files, media and database storage are backed up daily to a remote secure object storage. All other instances are backed up weekly with a full virtual server snapshot.
  • TurtleIsland.* and Allies.* instances may have unscheduled maintenance or upgrade events. We have over 99% uptime availability.

Data, Image and File Warranties/Guarantees

Even though there are regular backup procedures, there are no data, image and file warranties/guarantees. Images may be compressed or resized. It is user responsibility to keep copies of all data, images and files uploaded to or created on Turtle Island instances.

Turtle Island Rules

1. These are Indigenous instances.

  • Any anti-Indigenous activity from a Turtle Island account at the sole determination of the administrators or moderators will be grounds for account(s) termination.
  • Any anti-Indigenous activity from an external instance at the sole determination of the administrators or moderators will be grounds for user blocking, report filing, and/or domain blocking/de-federation.

2. We can't stress this enough - Absolutely no racism, anti-semitism, islamophobia, pro-genocide, pro-ethnic cleansing, pro-terrorism, sexism, homophobia, and transphobia. 95%+ of our issues fall in this category; we take this seriously.

  • Any infraction of this category from a Turtle Island account at the sole determination of the administrators or moderators will be grounds for account termination.
  • Any infraction of this category from an external instance at the sole determination of the administrators or moderators will be grounds for user blocking, report filing, and/or domain blocking/de-federation.

Extra clarity current events note:

River to Sea is ethnic cleansing and anti-Semitic. Promoting settlements in the West Bank is ethnic cleansing and Islamophobic. It doesn't matter how many misinformed or disingenuous articles you read or who counsels you otherwise, these acts cannot be sanitized. The majority of the Jewish population will see River to Sea as ethnic cleansing and very anti-Semitic, and the majority of the Palestinian population will see settlement building in the West Bank as ethnic cleansing and very Islamophobic. These are just a couple examples that come up frequently.

You can criticize the Israeli or Palestinian governments all day and night long if you wish, but the moment you add anti-Semitic or Islamophobic material to your post, the whole post becomes anti-Semitic or Islamophobic.

Turtle Island instances officially support a two state solution in Israel/Palestine as the only realistic and fair solution for the Israeli and Palestinian peoples. Both peoples are factually Indigenous to the region by the same standards that apply to North American Indigenous peoples. If this is not clear to you, you need to go back to non-propaganda history study.

If any part of this current events note makes you chafe, Turtle Island may not be the place for you. Peace and co-existence are the only acceptable goals on Turtle Island.

3. Advertising authentic Indigenous products and genuine Indigenous businesses is allowed and encouraged.

  • Advertising fake inspired appropriated products by non-Indigenous businesses is not allowed.

4. We strongly support and encourage Mutual Aid with #IndigenousMutualAid, #SettlerSaturday and #MutualAid hashtags.

  • Requests for mutual aid must be on your original post. Requests cannot be made in unsolicited comments or private messages to other users.
  • Posts cannot tag other users, especially bulk user lists.
  • Inappropriate hashtag bombing is not allowed.
  • Guideline violations could result locally in post deletion or user suspension, or remotely in user or instance defederation.

5. No Native/Indigenous gatekeeping of accounts on Native/Indigenous instances.

  • If you have an issue with the Indigeneity of an account on an Indigenous instance, DM or email the admins and/or moderators of the instance.
  • Regardless of the opinions and seriousness of this subject or what instance a user of questionable Indigeneity may be on, immature and abusive posts, dogpiling, parody or sock puppet accounts, etc. are part of a vibe we do not want coming here from Twitter and are expressly not allowed.
  • None of this is to say the Pretendian subject is forbidden, but keep it mature please.

6. Promotion of Right-Wing, Conservative, Republican, Fascist, Nazi or other equally stupid political views is not allowed.

  • If moral deficiency is your inclination, go somewhere else.

7. This goes against Turtle Island's preferences, but in acquiescence to Fediverse community standards, NSFW content requires Content Warnings (CWs). Nudity, porn or gratuitous violence requires CWs. Turtle Island does not require CWs for other types of content. If you are in doubt, please ask. Generally speaking though, if you are easily offended, Turtle Island may not be the place for you.

8. Any other issues not covered by these rules will be settled by the sole determination of the administrators or moderators.
Short: Native/Indigenous owned and operated for Allies of Native, Indigenous, BIPOC, and other marginalized people. Allies.social is ad-free, corporate-free, bigotry-free, and culture respectful.

Operated by: Digital Dimension, the driving force behind MI-SOPORTE.online. We are dedicated to building strong digital communities and empowering businesses, professionals, and content creators in the evolving digital landscape.

Moderation: Our server is moderated by a dedicated team that ensures a safe, respectful, and professional environment. We adhere to strict guidelines to maintain the quality and integrity of discussions.

Funding: The server is funded by MI-SOPORTE.online memberships and contributions from Digital Dimension. Our aim is to keep the platform sustainable, ad-free, and focused on providing value to our community.

Welcome to our Mastodon community! ğŸŒ

Community Focus: This platform is an extension of MI-SOPORTE.online, aiming to foster collaboration, learning, and growth. We encourage members to share insights, ask questions, and collaborate on projects.

Tools & Resources: As a member, you have access to a plethora of digital tools and resources from MI-SOPORTE.online. From web3 and blockchain to e-commerce and digital marketing, we've got you covered.

Trusted Integrators: Digital Dimension is one of the trusted integrators, but our community is vast. Connect with experts from various fields and learn from the best.

Academia de TecnologÃ­a: We're not just about tools; we're about education. Engage with our academy, learn new skills, and stay ahead in the digital world.

Open to All: Whether you're a business owner, a professional, a content creator, or someone curious about the digital realm, there's a place for you here.

Remember, this is a space for constructive discussions, knowledge sharing, and collaboration. Let's make the digital world more accessible and inclusive for everyone! ğŸš€
Short: Digital Dimension powers this server, part of MI-SOPORTE.online. A hub for businesses, professionals, and creators in the digital realm. Join our thriving community!

Description:
Welcome to PhotoLovers.net, a vibrant haven within the expansive Fediverse, a network teeming with over 14 million users. Here, the art of photography is not just celebrated but truly lived. In this digital space, every click of the camera is an ode to the magic of capturing moments, transforming fleeting seconds into timeless treasures.

At PhotoLovers.net, we understand that photography is more than just a technical skillâ€”it's a form of art, an avenue of pleasure, and a source of boundless fun. It's about seeing the world not just as it is, but as it could be, through the lens of creativity and passion.

Our community, nestled within the diverse and vibrant ecosystem of the Fediverse, is a mosaic of diverse perspectives, united by a common love for seizing instants and exploring the world. Whether you're an amateur just starting out, a seasoned professional, or simply someone who appreciates the beauty in a well-captured image, you're in the right place.

Here, we encourage you to share your vision, learn from the insights of others, and engage in the joy of photography. From breathtaking landscapes to the subtle nuances of everyday life, each photo tells a story, each shutter click a testament to the power of observation and expression.

Explore galleries filled with stunning visuals, participate in challenges that spark your creativity, and engage in discussions that deepen your understanding and appreciation of this captivating art form.

Being part of the Fediverse, PhotoLovers.net offers the unique opportunity to connect with a vast, decentralized network of photography enthusiasts and creators. Here, every member is both a learner and a teacher, a viewer and a creator. So, whether you're here to capture an instant or to observe the world through the eyes of other enthusiasts, you are not just welcomeâ€”you're an integral part of a much larger story.

Dive into the world of PhotoLovers.net, where every photo is an adventure, and every moment is an opportunity to create something eternal. Embrace the vastness of the Fediverse and let your passion for photography soar.
Short: Taking a photo means capturing a moment and making it everlasting. Photography is art, it's enjoyment, it's fun. In the vast network of the Fediverse, this space welcomes everyone who loves to seize an instant and see the world through the eyes of fellow enthusiasts. Welcome to PhotoLovers.net, your gateway to over 14 million users sharing your passion.
Small personal mastodon instance

Description:
Music.Social is for anyone who loves music, or is a musician (or both!).

It's designed as a place to share our passion for music, in a decentralised social media environment which is: -

  • not controlled by big corporations;
  • doesn't make money by harvesting your data;
  • carries no advertising;
  • isn't driven by dodgy algorithms.

The service has been built, and is hosted and paid for, by Amazing, the British company which specialises in finding and promoting new musical talent. Amazing makes no money out of Music.Social and is not controlling the content.

amazing.radio | thisisamazing.tv
Short: Welcome to music.social

Description:
Welcome!

This is the Mastodon server of the Institute of Nursing Science (INS), Department of Public Health (DPH) at the Medical Faculty of the University of Basel.

https://mstdn.nursing.unibas.ch is an online community to connect INS staff, students, alumni and collaborators with the fediverse. Registration requires approval by INS admins. If you are unsure whether this applies to you, register here and we will let you know. If you do not belong to the group of people mentioned above and want to join a Mastodon server, here are some common alternatives:

Mastodon Social

Swiss Social

Fedi Science

Visit Join Mastodon to get more suggestions for Mastodon instances to join.

To get started, follow these steps:

Create an account

First you need to register here to get your account. After you agree to some basic rules and you have confirmed your email, you are ready.

Bookmark or get an app

You probably like to make yourself at home with either bookmarking:

https://mstdn.nursing.unibas.ch

or trying out some apps:

Ice cubes (MaOS/iOS)

Metatext (iOS)

Ivory (iOS)

Tusky (Android)

AndStatus (Android)

Elk (Web client)

Follow others

Thousands of scientists are active on Mastodon, and you can follow all of them. It does not matter which instance (server) they are on. Mastodon has no algorithm that determines what is shown on your home timeline. Follow generously to populate this timeline. The federated timeline shows all posts of people people on https://mstdn.nursing.unibas.ch are following. This is why it is important to follow others. When you newly follow someone, you will not see any or very few posts. Mastodon does not backtrack past posts of people. They will pop-up if you follow them and they post ('toot') something.

Boosts and #hashtags

Mastodon does not have 'likes', so boosts are a great way to get visibility for a post. Also, remember to use hashtags in your posts, as these also help to increase visibility. You can follow specific #hashtags. If you see a #hashtag in a post you are interested in, click on it and follow the hashtag. This way you find also posts from people you do not follow.

Groups

Similar like #hashtags you can follow groups, which connects posts of people using the group's name. For example, if you follow @nursingresearch@chirp.social and use the hashtags #nursres #nursingresearch, you can easily share your posts with people who follow @nursingresearch@chirp.social. This works for all sorts of topics. Visit chirp.social or https://a.gup.pe/ to find more groups or to create your own.

Relays

As https://mstdn.nursing.unibas.ch is small we use relays to identify interesting posts across the fediverse. Find below a list of #hashtags we currently use. If you feel we need to add others, please let us know.

Currently used hashtags: Science, rstats, phdlife, nursing, impsci, epi, ebm, ScienceMastodon, AcademicMastodon, pflege, pflegewissenschaft, stem, PhD, PublicHealth, NursingHomes, Oncology, PhDChat, AcademicChatter, Implementation, workforce, OlderPeople, ImplementationScience, CH, Schweiz, BL, BS, Basel
Short: Mastodon Server of the Institute of Nursing Science @UNIBAS
topic: Mastodon Server of the Institute of Nursing Science @UNIBAS

We believe one aspect of building power is reducing reliance on corporate social media as a method of disseminating information, and we started this instance with the goal of supporting activist groups who want an alternative or additional communication channel.

Description: Beschreibung

The Digital Pioneers Social Club ist eine Initiative von 12 GrÃ¼ndungsmitgliedern, die in Zeiten einer immer schnelleren, komplexeren und teils auch unfreundlicheren Online-Welt auf die AnfÃ¤nge des Internets zurÃ¼ckblicken.

Wir gehÃ¶ren zur letzten Generation ohne Internet und zur ersten Generation, die das World Wide Web betreten hat.

Wir haben den Eindruck, dass das Internet irgendwo falsch abgebogen ist. DarÃ¼ber wollen wir reden und schreiben. Und Ã¼berlegen, ob und wie wir das nochmal neu machen kÃ¶nnen.

Wir machen das im Fediverse, weil es dezentral, werbefrei und unabhÃ¤ngig ist. Und ein bisschen kompliziert - und auch irgendwie oldschool.

Wo Ihr uns findet

digitalpioneers.club

Unter der URL digitalpioneers.club findet Ihr unser Blog, The Digital Pioneers Times. Hier erzÃ¤hlen wir uns und Euch WeiÃŸt-Du-noch-Geschichten und schreiben auf, welche Ideen und Erkenntnisse uns bei unseren GesprÃ¤chen im Fediversum gekommen sind.

digitalpioneers.social

Unter der URL digitalpioneers.social findet Ihr unseren Salon im Fediversum. Stellt Euch einen gemÃ¼tlichen Raum mit offenem Kamin, kuscheligen Sofas und eine ausgezeichneten Bar vor, und eine illustre plauschende und diskutierende Runde Ã¼ber die Antwort auf das Leben, dem Fediversum und dem ganzen Rest.

Mehr Ã¼ber uns: https://digitalpioneers.club/wer-wir-sind/

Description:
Welcome to rtsn.dev

Our instance motto is simple:

Letâ€™s leave the internet a little better than we found it. And donâ€™t be a jerk.

Apply for an account

Specifically, we donâ€™t allow:

  • Any form of hate or the advocacy of hate, including but not limited to racism, sexism, misogyny, homophobia, transphobia, xenophobia, nationalism, classism, ableism, and antisemitism.
  • Mean-spirited personal attacks, intentional unkindness, or doxxing. That doesnâ€™t mean you have to be polite: in fact, members are encouraged to call out bad behavior. But again, donâ€™t be a jerk.
  • Intentional misinformation.
  • Pornographic images/videos/etc. (This is for practical reasons: weâ€™re not set up to handle the age verification and moderation burden associated with this kind of content).
  • Shilling crypto, gambling, scams, MLMs, etc.
  • Passing off someone elseâ€™s work as your own or non-comedic impersonation.
  • Content that has little-to-no value and is designed purely for engagement (see the reddit self-promotion guidelines for a sense of where to draw this line).

Moderation decisions will be made based on the spirit of these rules, not the letter. Extreme, blatant violations may result in an immediate ban. Most violations will be handled privately, and members will have the option to either remove/modify their post or migrate to another instance. If you are acting in good faith, weâ€™ll do our best to help you migrate seamlessly to another instance that better matches your values without any disruption to your access to the fediverse.
Short: A mastodon instance for web artisans. Apply for membership at https://tally.so/r/3xJRGG

Bitte beachtet, andere Instanzen haben andere Regeln. Was hier erlaubt ist, kann dort verboten sein und umgekehrt. Wenn Ihr VerstÃ¶ÃŸe erkennt, kÃ¶nnt Ihr diese Ã¼ber das Meldesystem melden. Server

Description:
Welcome to JournMe.Social

JournMe.Social is a vibrant Mastodon community where individuals from all walks of life come together to share and celebrate the diverse tapestry of human experiences. Our members are passionate about documenting their life journeys, be it through personal stories, reflective essays, stunning photography, or artistic expressions. Here, you'll find a kaleidoscope of narratives ranging from thrilling adventures and travel escapades to deeply personal growth and transformative experiences.

Whether you're a seasoned traveler, a thoughtful diarist, a creative soul, or just someone who loves to explore the rich complexities of life, JournMe.Social offers a welcoming and supportive space. Our community thrives on empathy, understanding, and the shared joy of discovery. Join us in this unique endeavor to chronicle the myriad paths we tread in the grand adventure of life. Let's inspire and be inspired, as we each contribute our own unique chapter to the grand story of humanity.

Federated Community

Federated social media, exemplified by Mastodon, is akin to a network of interconnected communities. Each 'instance', like our own JournMe.Social, operates independently but is part of a larger, connected network. This structure allows for diverse, self-governed communities while enabling interaction across the entire network.

Mastodon's decentralized nature contrasts with traditional social media's singular, corporate-dominated platforms. It offers a sense of ownership and intimacy, fostering unique community atmospheres. JournMe.Social is one such space, focused on sharing human experiences, and is part of this wider, diverse Mastodon federation.

Security Recommendation: Please enable 2-Factor Authentication in preferences
Short: Share your journey through life with the community on JournMe.Social.

Description:
Welcome to Bongo Social, your friendly regional Mastodon server based in the heart of East Africa, nestled in the vibrant landscapes of Kilimanjaro and Zanzibar.

Created with a passion for fostering local community connections while embracing global interaction, Bongo Social aims to provide a welcoming and inclusive space for users across Tanzania and beyond.

Our instance celebrates the rich cultural diversity, stunning wildlife, and breathtaking landscapes that define Tanzania. Whether you're a tech enthusiast, an artist, an activist, or simply looking to engage in meaningful conversations, Bongo Social offers a platform where you can share experiences, ideas, and discussions with like-minded individuals.

Join us in exploring the wonders of Tanzania, discussing local events, traditions, and societal issues while connecting with users from neighboring East African countries and worldwide. Embracing multiple languages spoken in the region, our instance encourages multilingual conversations, creating a space where everyone feels valued and understood.

At Bongo Social, your privacy and security are of utmost importance. We strive to maintain a safe environment by adhering to strict community guidelines and fostering a respectful atmosphere for all users.

Whether you're passionate about wildlife conservation, eager to share your artistic creations, or seeking meaningful connections within East Africa and beyond, Bongo Social invites you to be part of a vibrant online community, uniting individuals through shared interests and regional connections. Join us on this exciting journey as we celebrate the beauty and diversity of Tanzania while engaging in global discourse. Karibu sana!
Short: Welcome to Bongo Social,friendly regional Mastodon server based in the heart of East Africa,nestled in the landscapes of Tanzania.Aims to provide a welcoming and inclusive space for all users, Karibu!
